name: @turistikrota/ui
description: the turistikrota ui library for React

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.beforepub: npm run build && npm run prettier && npm run lint && cp package.json dist && cp README.md dist && cp LICENSE dist && cp ./src/assets/*.css dist/assets && cp ./src/assets/*.cjs dist/assets
scripts.beforepub:win: npm run build && npm run prettier && npm run lint && wsl cp package.json dist && wsl cp README.md dist && wsl cp LICENSE dist && wsl cp ./src/assets/*.css dist/assets && wsl cp ./src/assets/*.cjs dist/assets
